user.title: Add Avalon Miner
user.description: Enter the IP address of your Avalon miner. It must already be reachable on the network (port 4028 open).

options.title: Miner Startup Configuration
options.description: These settings are applied automatically each time the miner comes online.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the miner. Make sure it is powered on, reachable on the network, and port 4028 is open.
error.frequencies_not_ascending: Frequencies must be in strictly ascending order: Zone 1 < Zone 2 < Zone 3 < Zone 4.

init.title: Update Miner Configuration
init.description: Changes take effect on the next miner connection (or immediately if the miner is online).

error.frequencies_not_ascending: Frequencies must be in strictly ascending order: Zone 1 < Zone 2 < Zone 3 < Zone 4.
